name: Distribution Hunter
description:
How to Play

WASD or Arrows to move view.

The goal is to keep everyone in your village fed (reach a "Villagers Fed" number of 100%). To do this, you'll need hunters to kill animals and bring them back to the distribution center, and you'll need distributors to distribute food to the village.

You'll have to balance - If there's not many animals remaining, you should build fountains to boost their population, and consider using the "Stop Hunters" button until there's more available.

You should achieve a steady flow of both hunters bringing in meat, and distributors delivering it. With this, your villagers will be fed quicker than they go hungry and you'll win.
